description:
Essex on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS

nova-api throws the error "Section must be started before assignment: None", but my nova.conf file is proper and as per ubuntu format.


# nova-api  --config-file=/etc/nova/nova.conf
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/nova-api", line 46, in <module>
    flags.FLAGS(sys.argv)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/flags.py", line 45, in __call__
    return argv[:1] + super(NovaConfigOpts, self).__call__(args)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/openstack/common/cfg.py", line 856, in __call__
    self._parse_config_files(self.config_file)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/openstack/common/cfg.py", line 1175, in _parse_config_files
    raise ConfigFileParseError(pe.filename, str(pe))
nova.openstack.common.cfg.ConfigFileParseError: Failed to parse /etc/nova/nova.conf: at /etc/nova/nova.conf:2, Section must be started before assignment: None
Exception KeyError: KeyError(139979733621232,) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored



# cat /etc/nova/nova.conf
--verbose=True
--auth_strategy=keystone
--compute_scheduler_driver=nova.scheduler.filter_scheduler.FilterScheduler
--volume_group=nova-volumes
--volume_name_template=volume-%08x
--iscsi_helper=tgtadm
--sql_connection=mysql://nova:mysql@openstack/nova
--libvirt_type=qemu
--connection_type=libvirt
--instance_name_template=instance-%08x
--api_paste_config=/etc/nova/api-paste.ini
--allow_resize_to_same_host=True
--osapi_compute_extension=nova.api.openstack.compute.contrib.standard_extensions
--ec2_dmz_host=openstack
--s3_host=srmesx10-vm1
--rabbit_host=localhost
--rabbit_password=rabbitmq
--image_service=nova.image.glance.GlanceImageService
--glance_api_servers=openstack:9292
--network_manager=nova.network.manager.FlatDHCPManager
--fixed_range=192.168.100.0/24
--flat_network_dhcp_start=192.168.100.2
--public_interface=eth0
--flat_interface=eth0
--flat_network_bridge=br100
--novncproxy_base_url=http://openstack:6080/vnc_auto.html
--vncserver_proxyclient_address=openstack
--vncserver_listen=openstack
title: not able to start nova api

comments.content:
Essex on Ubuntu 12.04 LTS

nova-api throws the error "Section must be started before assignment: None", but my nova.conf file is proper and as per ubuntu format.


# nova-api  --config-file=/etc/nova/nova.conf
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/nova-api", line 46, in <module>
    flags.FLAGS(sys.argv)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/flags.py", line 45, in __call__
    return argv[:1] + super(NovaConfigOpts, self).__call__(args)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/openstack/common/cfg.py", line 856, in __call__
    self._parse_config_files(self.config_file)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/openstack/common/cfg.py", line 1175, in _parse_config_files
    raise ConfigFileParseError(pe.filename, str(pe))
nova.openstack.common.cfg.ConfigFileParseError: Failed to parse /etc/nova/nova.conf: at /etc/nova/nova.conf:2, Section must be started before assignment: None
Exception KeyError: KeyError(139979733621232,) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored



# cat /etc/nova/nova.conf
--verbose=True
--auth_strategy=keystone
--compute_scheduler_driver=nova.scheduler.filter_scheduler.FilterScheduler
--volume_group=nova-volumes
--volume_name_template=volume-%08x
--iscsi_helper=tgtadm

--allow_resize_to_same_host=True
--osapi_compute_extension=nova.api.openstack.compute.contrib.standard_extensions
--ec2_dmz_host=openstack

--rabbit_password=rabbitmq
--image_service=nova.image.glance.GlanceImageService
--glance_api_servers=openstack:9292
--network_manager=nova.network.manager.FlatDHCPManager
--fixed_range=192.168.100.0/24
--flat_network_dhcp_start=192.168.100.2
--public_interface=eth0
--flat_interface=eth0
--flat_network_bridge=br100
--novncproxy_base_url=http://openstack:6080/vnc_auto.html
--vncserver_proxyclient_address=openstack
--vncserver_listen=openstack

comments.content:
I am facing same problem.

 File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compat/flagfile.py", line 151, in _iterate_args
    modified = iterator(args[i], args[i + 1], **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compat/flagfile.py", line 98, in _read_flagfile
    args = _read_lines(flagfile)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compat/flagfile.py", line 70, in _read_lines
    with _open_file_for_reading(flagfile) as f:
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/dist-packages/nova/compat/flagfile.py", line 60, in _open_file_for_reading
    return open(path, 'r')
IOError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/etc/nova/nova.conf'
Exception KeyError: KeyError(140102298999568,) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~milindkpatil

comments.content:
Even, I am facing the same problem:
IOError: [Errno 13] Permission denied: '/etc/nova/nova.conf'
Exception KeyError: KeyError(.....,) in <module 'threading' from '/usr/lib/python2.7/threading.pyc'> ignored

Can anyone please provide the solution for this?

Thanks.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~poojasharma-smit

comments.content:
"Section must be started before assignment: None" seems to show that you need to add one section name in the front of your nova.conf, eg:

[DEFAULT]

--verbose=True
--auth_strategy=keystone
........
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~zhhuabj

comments.content: If you're going to start nova-api manually like that and use the old config file format, you need to specify --flagfile instead of --config-file.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb
